posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

Working on the monster! Thank you to those of you who helped me add over 100 cards to my collection in August. Currently, I am about 1/3rd of the way there. Given the volume, in an effort to minimize back and forth, I am looking to pay the price from the PSA guide (path at bottom). If you have cards that fit the criteria, assuming I don't already have that card, I am willing buy it/them off of you at the price listed below.

[url]https://www.psacard.com/priceguide/b...te-border/1055[/url]

Thanks!
Taylor

cards just in August?  Good grief... I am only 25% done after 30 years....


Good luck on completing your set!
My post a few weeks ago got me a bunch of offers/cards. This is such a great group.

Over 1/3rd of the way there! Thanks guys!

Let me know of any cards you have that meet the perimeters at PSA pricing and if I don’t have it, I’ll purchase it from you. Thanks!

Best,
Taylor

I have sent you a pm


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
